attributes.review: When I opened this app, it did not show me information on trumps election. It showed me explicit content. The nerve of a president to do this 😤

attributes.title: Rats
attributes.review: This app made RATS spawn from my phone. (AND NOT THE GOOD KIND) do not download. this app was filled with bugs. Made my phone crash several times. (House still filled with rats)

attributes.title: APP WAS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Hi so I downloaded this app, and like many of the other reviewers, I found it completely slow and it kept crashing as well. DO NOT GET THIS.
